channel.title: Overview on Mac Strelioff
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Mac Strelioff

item.title: Behavioral Interviewing
item.description: Principles Common Behavioral Questions “Tell me a little about your background.” Child bandits: “Tell me about the project you worked on at Insight.” “Why are you interested in a career as a data scientist?” “Tell me about your research / talk to me about your last role.” “Why are you interested in joining this company?” “Talk about a time you were on a team that struggled with effective communication.

item.title: Business Sense
item.description: Problem Solving Strategy Overall product sense is about what to build and why. Overarching goals / stage of the company Contextualize: Draw a user funnel or user flow for the specific product Draw a dashboard, then populate with platform and product metrics Overall resources https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOhHNjZItNnM5r2JCX9KzrFH5WYWKrpAA Platform Concepts and Metrics Users User Funnel Churn, funnel analysis User Flow Traffic source: Where users come from (search, referral, … ) number new visits, percent new visits Page visits: users arriving at page Bounce rate: the percentage of visitors to a particular website who navigate away from the site after viewing only one page.

item.title: Computer Science
item.description: Foundations Complexity Computational Complexity Constant Time: O(1) Logrithmic Time: O(log(n)) Polynomial Time: O(n), O(n^2), … Exponential Time: \(O(x^n)\) Logrithmic Time: O(log(N)) Data Structures Trees Binary search trees Database and SQL General Structure of SQL querys Aggregation functions Sorting Searching Ranking Algorithms Recommendation Algorithms Tools General Practice Problems Foundations Data type manipulation (char, string, numeric, binary, ascii) regular expressions; Complexity The worst-case complexity of an algorithm is represented with big-O notation.

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: Considerations Bias-variance trade-off Overfitting and Underfitting Cost Functions and Metrics Feature Engineering Seperability Assumptions about form of relationship Unsupervised Clustering k-means Agglomerative Devisive Matrix Decomposition PCA Principle Components Analysis SVD Singular Value Decomposition Text-based LDA Latent Direchilote Analysis LSA Latent Semantic Analysis Supervised Regression Linear Support Vector Machine (SVM) Classification Naive Bayes Discriminant Analysis KNN Logistic Regression Ensemble Methods Trees and Forests Regression Classification Open ended Template Raw data structure?

item.title: Probability and Statistics
item.description: Probability Foundations Probability Rules Odds and other transformations Expectation and Variance Central limit theorem Experiment Design Objective, demand, and value Constructs, metrics, and scoping User flow and target metrics Invariants Confounding variables Precision variables Metric Validation Conditions Treatment Units Assignment Mechanism Population Cohorts Synthetic Control Groups Limitations Implementation Size Duration Temporal variation Optional stopping Estimands Effiencicy Testing Binary or Proportions Fisher’s Z Real-Valued Regression Linear Models GLMs Emperical Variance Estimation Fermi problems (order of magnitude)
